com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.discovery.v1.model.configuration

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.model.GenericModel
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.discovery.v1.model.configuration.Configuration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateConfigurationResponse, GetConfigurationResponse, UpdateConfigurationResponse

    public class Configuration
extends GenericModel
    A Configuration is used to define how a Document will be ingested. It contains various settings for different file types and various steps of the ingestion process. The three basic steps are Conversions, Enrichments, and Normalizations
    See Also:
    Conversions, Enrichment, NormalizationOperation
